String.string: Speak with Verdas in Wyvern Watch.
Go to where the {@LinkCreature:38#2002#White Wolf} was probably heading.
Speak with Halrath in Thunder Hold.
Use the scroll to summon Halrath to {@LinkCreature:38#2003#the top of the Ruined Tower}.
Speak with Halrath at {@LinkCreature:38#2003#the top of the Ruined Tower}.
Speak with Halrath at {@LinkCreature:38#2003#the top of the Ruined Tower}.
Speak with Verdas in Wyvern Watch.
